live_updates: We continue to await restoration of hydro power to be restored in the affected areas. Once hydro is restored our services will begin to come online. Thank you for your patience.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
30832.summary: Some customers in the Lower Mainland & Vancouver Island are experiencing a service interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services due to Hydro related difficulties. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
30832.title: Dec 22 – Lower Mainland & Vancouver Island | All Services - Hydro Related - Outage (Fix in Progress)
